description:
Less is more, so the saying goes. The Aura AG LT brings a slightly simpler feature set than its predecessor but still offers the same body-hugging comfort. Osprey's brilliant Anti-Gravity suspension supports the load and holds it slightly away from your back for comfortable carrying through the kilometres. Hipbelt pockets and the side access to the main compartment keep you organized, while compression straps let you keep things streamlined as you eat through your food.

  • Made of lightweight 210-denier nylon and durable 500-denier high-density nylon base with a PCF-free DWR finish for weather resistance
  • Anti-Gravity suspension with peripheral frame and suspended mesh back panel effectively transfers the load to the hipbelt while letting cool air flow through to your back
  • Seamlessly integrated lumbar pad and hipbelt transfers weight without rubbing
  • Ladder adjustment system offers a wide range of torso adjustability
  • Die-cut foam shoulder straps with mesh ExoFoam wrap for enhanced comfort
  • Extendable Fit-on-the-Fly® hipbelt can be easily adjusted on the go
  • Front shove-it pocket and side water bottle pockets
  • Curved zippered access on one side so you can gear quickly
  • Zippered lid pocket and hipbelt pockets provide secure storage
  • Dual ice axe loops with upper compression strap capture
  • Side compression straps and removable sleeping pad straps cinch in the load and allow you to attach extra gear
  • Includes an integrated rain cover so you're always prepared for bad weather
  • Dedicated internal hydration compartment with Osprey Hydraclip for easier reservoir hanging. (Reservoir sold separately)
name: Osprey Atmos AG LT 50 Backpack - Men's
